    level="1"
    right="Item 22"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Perfected Robes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2364)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These unadorned white robes, fastened with simple brass pins in the shape of a human hand, can’t be soiled or blemished. While wearing perfected robes, you don’t need to eat, sleep, or drink, but you can if you choose to. The robes bless you with constant [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) (+32 counteract bonus). A creature who dons these robes without earning them is [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) 3, [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) 3, and [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94) 3 while wearing them, gaining the _truesight_ but otherwise unable to use the robes’ magic.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** If your next action is to attempt a d20 roll with which you have legendary proficiency, roll twice and take the better result. This is a [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) effect.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_avatar_](/Spells.aspx?ID=16), gaining the abilities for [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10).

**Destruction** If the wearer ever willingly turns from the path of self-perfection into corruption or overindulgence, their _perfected robes_ crumble to nothing.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
